data.title: Official NCDMV: Vehicle Title & Registration Fees
data.text:
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Title Fees

​​​

​​Registration Fees

Re​gistration fees vary depending on the type of vehicle being plated.

​​

Regional Fees & Taxes

​​

Notary Fees

The following are maximum fees that may be charged. All notary fees must be paid in cash.

Assessments apply to each transaction. Collections by NCDMV employees are for taking acknowledgment of signatures on title and license application forms with a space for attestation before a notary public.​

​​ ​

​ *State offices are located at the Raleigh Central Service Office License Plate Agency, 4121 New Bern Ave., Raleigh and the West Charlotte Driver License Office, 6016 Brookshire Blvd., Charlotte.
